00263 
00264 int llp_handle_data(u_char *packet_data, int packet_length) {
00265         int content_length;
00266         int mac_length;
00267         int session;
00268         int offset;
00269         int return_value;
00270         llp_packet_p packet;
00271         u_char *content = NULL;
00272         u_char *mac = NULL;
00273         
00274         /* Reading beginning of packet. */
00275         /* No need to use safe reading functions, because llp_listen_socket discards
00276          * packets that are lesser than 5 bytes in length, and only those packet
00277          * could harm the parser behavior. */
00278         offset = 0;
00279         util_read_byte(&packet.type, &offset, packet_data);
00280         util_read_byte(&packet.llp_data.session, &offset, packet_data);
00281 
00282         session = packet.llp_data.session;
00283 
00284         llp_lock_session(session);
00285         switch(llp_sessions[session].state) {
00286                 case LLP_STATE_CLOSED:
00287                 case LLP_STATE_CONNECTING:
00288                 case LLP_STATE_BEING_CONNECTED:
00289                         liblog_error(LAYER_LINK,
00290                                         "packet received in a not established session."
00291                                         " Packet dropped.");
00292                         return_value = LLP_ERROR;
00293                         goto return_label;
00294         }
00295 
00296         /* Calculating lengths before using them */
00297         mac_length = llp_sessions[session].mac->length;
00298         content_length = packet_length - mac_length - sizeof(u_short);
00299         
00300         /* Check if this packet is too small to be valid. */
00301         if (content_length < sizeof(u_char) + sizeof(u_short)) {
00302                 /* Packet is smaller than an LLP_KEEP_ALIVE packet. */
00303                 return_value = LLP_ERROR;
00304                 goto return_label;
00305         }
00306         
00307         /* Allocating memory for packet. */
00308         content = (u_char *)malloc(content_length);
00309         mac = (u_char *)malloc(mac_length);
00310         if (content == NULL || mac == NULL) {
00311                 liblog_fatal(LAYER_LINK, "error in malloc: %s.", strerror(errno));
00312                 return_value = LLP_ERROR;
00313                 goto return_label;
00314         }
00315         
00316         /* Reading rest of packet. */
00317         /* No nead to use safe reading functions, because the lengths are
00318          * computed using the packet length. */
00319         util_read_bytes(content, &offset, packet_data, content_length);
00320         util_read_bytes(mac, &offset, packet_data, mac_length);
00321         
00322         /* Handle the content. */
00323         if (handle_encrypted_content(content, content_length, mac, session)
00324                         == LLP_ERROR) {
00325                 liblog_error(LAYER_LINK, "error handling data content.");
00326                 return_value = LLP_ERROR;
00327                 goto return_label;
00328         }
00329         
00330         /* Update the session info */
00331         llp_sessions[session].packets_received++;
00332         
00333         /* Timeout is only resetted if the session is not being closed. This way
00334          * if a LLP_CLOSE_OK packet is not received, the timeouts threads will
00335          * close it automatically. */
00336         if (llp_sessions[session].state != LLP_STATE_CLOSE_WAIT) {
00337                 llp_sessions[session].timeout = LLP_T_TIMEOUT;
00338         }
00339 
00340         return_value = LLP_OK;
00341         
00342 return_label:
00343         
00344         llp_unlock_session(session);
00345         free(content);
00346         free(mac);
00347 
00348         return return_value;
00349 }
00350 /******************************************************************************/
00351 int llp_keep_session_alive(int session) {
00352         int return_value;
00353         
00354         llp_lock_session(session);
00355         if (llp_sessions[session].state == LLP_STATE_ESTABLISHED) {
00356                 return_value = send_keep_alive(session);
00357         } else {
00358                 liblog_error(LAYER_LINK, "the session is not established.");
00359                 return_value = LLP_ERROR;
00360         }
00361         llp_unlock_session(session);
00362         
00363         return return_value;
00364 }
00365 /******************************************************************************/
00366 int llp_hunt_for_nodes(int session) {
00367         int return_value;
00368         struct timeval time;
00369         struct timezone timezone;
00370         
00371         llp_lock_session(session);
00372         if (llp_sessions[session].state == LLP_STATE_ESTABLISHED) {
00373                 return_value = send_node_hunt(session);
00374         } else {
00375                 liblog_error(LAYER_LINK, "the session is not established.");
00376                 return_value = LLP_ERROR;
00377         }
00378         
00379         gettimeofday(&time, &timezone);
00380         llp_sessions[session].hunt_time = time.tv_sec;
00381         llp_unlock_session(session);;
00382         
00383         return return_value;
00384 }
00385 /******************************************************************************/
00386 int llp_disconnect(int session) {
00387         int return_value;
00388 
00389         liblog_debug(LAYER_LINK, "disconnecting session %d.", session);
00390 
00391         llp_lock_session(session);
00392         /* Only sessions established or that are waiting a LLP_CLOSE_OK packet
00393          * can be disconnected. */
00394         if (llp_sessions[session].state == LLP_STATE_ESTABLISHED || 
00395                         llp_sessions[session].state == LLP_STATE_CLOSE_WAIT) {
00396                 llp_sessions[session].state = LLP_STATE_CLOSE_WAIT;
00397         } else {
00398                 liblog_error(LAYER_LINK, "session is not established.", session);
00399                 llp_unlock_session(session);
00400                 return LLP_ERROR;
00401         }               
00402         return_value = send_close_request(session);
00403         llp_unlock_session(session);
00404         
00405         /* Correcting number of active sessions. */
00406         llp_add_active_sessions_counter(-1);
00407         
00408         return return_value;
00409 }
00410 /******************************************************************************/
00411 int llp_read(int *session, u_char *data, int max) {
00412         int return_value = llp_dequeue_datagram(session, data, max);
00413         return (return_value == LLP_ERROR ? LINK_ERROR : return_value);
00414 }
00415 /******************************************************************************/
00416 int llp_flush() {
00417         int session;
00418         int return_value = 0;
00419         
00420         while (llp_try_dequeue_datagram(&session, NULL, -1) != LLP_ERROR) {
00421                 return_value++;
00422         }
00423         return return_value;
00424 }
00425 /******************************************************************************/
00426 int llp_write(int session, u_char *data, int length) {
00427         int return_value;
00428 
00429         llp_lock_session(session);
00430         if (llp_sessions[session].state == LLP_STATE_ESTABLISHED) {
00431                 return_value = send_datagram(session, data, length);
00432         } else {
00433                 liblog_error(LAYER_LINK, "the session is not established.");
00434                 return_value = LLP_ERROR;
00435         }
00436         llp_unlock_session(session);
00437         
00438         return return_value;
00439 }
00440 /******************************************************************************/
00441 int llp_hunt_valid(int session) {
00442         struct timeval time;
00443         struct timezone timezone;
00444         int return_value;
00445         long diff;
00446         
00447         gettimeofday(&time, &timezone);
00448         return_value = LLP_OK;
00449         
00450         llp_lock_session(session);
00451         diff = time.tv_sec - llp_sessions[session].hunt_time;
00452         if (diff > (LLP_T_TIMEOUT / LLP_TIME_TICKS_PER_SECOND)) {
00453                 return_value = LLP_ERROR;;
00454         }
00455         llp_unlock_session(session);
00456         
00457         return return_value;
00458 }
00459 
00460 /*============================================================================*/
00461 /* Private functions implementations.                                         */
00462 /*============================================================================*/
00463 
00464 int send_data(int session, u_char *data, int length) {
00465         int offset;
00466         int packet_length;
00467         int content_length;
00468         int mac_length;
00469         int return_value;
00470         u_char *mac;
00471         u_char *padding;
00472         u_char *packet;
00473         u_char *content;
00474         u_char *plain_content;
00475         u_short padding_length;
00476 
00477         liblog_debug(LAYER_LINK, "sending data by session %d.", session);
00478         
00479         if (llp_sessions[session].encrypted == LLP_SESSION_NOT_ENCRYPTED) {
00480                 padding_length = 0;
00481         } else {
00482                 if (length > LIBFREEDOM_FTU + sizeof(u_char)) {
00483                         liblog_error(LAYER_LINK, 
00484                                         "can't send packet with more than FTU bytes: (%d>FTU)", 
00485                                         length);
00486                         return LLP_ERROR;
00487                 }
00488                 /* Computing padding length. */
00489                 padding_length = LLP_MIN_PADDING_LENGTH + sizeof(u_char) 
00490                                 + LIBFREEDOM_FTU + sizeof(u_short);
00491                 if (padding_length % llp_sessions[session].cipher->block_size != 0) {
00492                         padding_length = padding_length 
00493                                         + llp_sessions[session].cipher->block_size
00494                                         - (padding_length%llp_sessions[session].cipher->block_size);    
00495                 }
00496                 /* The type of the packet is already in data. */
00497                 padding_length = padding_length - length - sizeof(u_short) ;
00498         }
00499         
00500         /* Determining the MAC length. */
00501         mac_length = llp_sessions[session].mac->length;
00502         
00503         /* Determining content length. */
00504         content_length = padding_length + length + sizeof(u_short);
00505         
00506         /* Determining the packet_size. */
00507         packet_length = 2*sizeof(u_char) + content_length + mac_length;
00508 
00509         liblog_debug(LAYER_LINK, "padding will be %d bytes long and packet will be "
00510                         "%d bytes long.", padding_length, packet_length);
00511 
00512         /* Allocating buffers. */
00513         packet = (u_char*)malloc(packet_length);
00514         padding = (u_char*)malloc(padding_length);
00515         plain_content = (u_char*)malloc(content_length);
00516         mac = (u_char*)malloc(mac_length);
00517         
00518         if (packet == NULL || plain_content == NULL || mac == NULL ||
00519                         padding == NULL) {
00520                 liblog_fatal(LAYER_LINK, "error in malloc: %s.", strerror(errno));
00521                 return_value = LLP_ERROR;
00522                 goto return_label;
00523         }
00524         
00525         /* Generating padding. */
00526         if (util_rand_bytes(padding, padding_length) == LLP_ERROR) {
00527                 liblog_error(LAYER_LINK, "error generating padding.");
00528                 return_value = LLP_ERROR;
00529                 goto return_label;
00530         }
00531         
00532         /* Constructing content. */
00533         offset = 0;
00534         util_rand_bytes(padding, padding_length);
00535         util_write_bytes (plain_content, &offset, padding, padding_length);
00536         util_write_bytes (plain_content, &offset, data, length);
00537         util_write_uint16(plain_content, &offset, padding_length);
00538         
00539         /* Generating MAC of the plaintext content. */
00540         llp_sessions[session].mac->function(mac, plain_content,
00541                         llp_sessions[session].mac_out_key, content_length);
00542         
00543         /* Constructing LLP_DATA packet. */
00544         UTIL_WRITE_START(packet)
00545         UTIL_WRITE_BYTE (LLP_DATA)
00546         UTIL_WRITE_BYTE (llp_sessions[session].foreign_session)
00547 
00548         /* Placing encrypted content in packet. */
00549         content = &packet[UTIL_WRITE_END];      /* Address to content be placed. */
00550         UTIL_WRITE_SEEK(content_length)         /* Skipping the content field. */
00551 
00552         /* Writing MAC on packet. */
00553         UTIL_WRITE_BYTES (mac, mac_length)
00554         
00555         /* Encrypting content */
00556         llp_sessions[session].cipher->function(content, plain_content, 
00557                         llp_sessions[session].cipher_out_key,
00558                         llp_sessions[session].cipher_out_iv, content_length,
00559                         UTIL_WAY_ENCRYPTION);
00560                         
00561         return_value = LLP_OK;
00562         
00563         /* Sending packet. */
00564         llp_sessions[session].silence = 0;
00565         llp_sessions[session].packets_sent++;
00566         if (llp_send_session_packet(session, packet, offset) == LLP_ERROR) {
00567                 liblog_debug(LAYER_LINK, "error sending packet.");
00568                 return_value = LLP_ERROR;
00569         }
00570         
00571         liblog_debug(LAYER_LINK, "packet sent.");
00572 
00573 return_label:
00574         
00575         free(packet);
00576         free(plain_content);
00577         free(mac);
00578         free(padding);
00579         return return_value;
00580 }
00581 /******************************************************************************/
00582 int send_datagram(int session, u_char *datagram, int length) {
00583         u_char *packet;
00584         
00585         liblog_debug(LAYER_LINK, "sending packet LLP_DATAGRAM.");
00586 
00587         packet = (u_char *)malloc(sizeof(u_char) + length);
00588         if (packet == NULL) {
00589                 liblog_fatal(LAYER_LINK, "error in malloc: %s.", strerror(errno));
00590                 return LLP_ERROR;
00591         }
00592 
00593         /* Constructing packet. */
00594         UTIL_WRITE_START(packet)
00595         UTIL_WRITE_BYTE (LLP_DATAGRAM);
00596         UTIL_WRITE_BYTES(datagram, length);
00597 
00598         /* Sending packet. */
00599         if (send_data(session, packet, UTIL_WRITE_END) == LLP_ERROR) {
00600                 free(packet);
00601                 liblog_error(LAYER_LINK, "error sending packet.");
00602                 return LLP_ERROR;
00603         }
00604 
00605         free(packet);
00606 
00607         return LLP_OK;  
00608         
00609 }
00610 /******************************************************************************/
00611 int send_close(int session, u_char type) {
00612         int hash_length;
00613         u_char *packet;
00614         
00615         liblog_debug(LAYER_LINK, "sending packet LLP_CLOSE, with type %d.", type);
00616 
00617         hash_length = llp_sessions[session].hash->length;
00618         packet = (u_char *)malloc(sizeof(u_char) + hash_length);
00619         if (packet == NULL) {
00620                 free(packet);
00621                 liblog_fatal(LAYER_LINK, "error in malloc: %s.", strerror(errno));
00622                 return LLP_ERROR;
00623         }
00624         
00625         /* Constructing packet. */
00626         UTIL_WRITE_START(packet)
00627         UTIL_WRITE_BYTE (type);
00628         UTIL_WRITE_BYTES(llp_sessions[session].verifier, hash_length);
00629         
00630         /* Sending packet. */
00631         if (send_data(session, packet, UTIL_WRITE_END) == LLP_ERROR) {
00632                 free(packet);
00633                 liblog_error(LAYER_LINK, "error sending packet.");
00634                 return LLP_ERROR;
00635         }
00636 
00637         free(packet);
00638 
00639         return LLP_OK;
00640 }
00641 /******************************************************************************/
00642 int send_close_ok(int session) {
00643         return send_close(session, LLP_CLOSE_OK);
00644 }
00645 /******************************************************************************/
00646 int send_close_request(int session) {
00647         return send_close(session, LLP_CLOSE_REQUEST);
00648 }
00649 /******************************************************************************/
00650 int send_node_hunt(int session) {
00651         u_char packet[sizeof(u_char)];
00652         
00653         liblog_debug(LAYER_LINK, "sending packet LLP_NODE_HUNT.");
00654 
00655         /* Constructing packet. */
00656         UTIL_WRITE_START(packet)
00657         UTIL_WRITE_BYTE (LLP_NODE_HUNT);
00658         liblog_debug(LAYER_LINK, "packet constructed.");
00659 
00660         /* Sending packet. */
00661         if (send_data(session, packet, UTIL_WRITE_END) == LLP_ERROR) {
00662                 liblog_error(LAYER_LINK, "error sending packet.");
00663                 return LLP_ERROR;
00664         }
00665 
00666         return LLP_OK;  
00667 }
00668 /******************************************************************************/
00669 int send_hunt_result(int session, struct sockaddr_in *addresses, int number) {
00670         int i;
00671         u_char packet[LLP_HUNT_RESULT_MAX_LENGTH];
00672         
00673         liblog_debug(LAYER_LINK, "sending packet LLP_HUNT_RESULT.");
00674 
00675         /* Constructing packet. */
00676         UTIL_WRITE_START(packet);
00677         UTIL_WRITE_BYTE(LLP_HUNT_RESULT);
00678         UTIL_WRITE_BYTE(number);
00679         for (i = 0; i < number; i++) {
00680                 UTIL_WRITE_BYTE(LLP_ADDRESS_INET);
00681                 UTIL_WRITE_BYTES((u_char *)&addresses[i].sin_addr,
00682                                 sizeof(struct in_addr));
00683                 /* We can use write_bytes beacuse sin_port is already stored on
00684                  * Network Byte Order. */
00685                 UTIL_WRITE_UINT16(ntohs(addresses[i].sin_port));
00686         }
00687 
00688         /* Sending packet. */
00689         if (send_data(session, packet, UTIL_WRITE_END) == LLP_ERROR) {
00690                 liblog_error(LAYER_LINK, "error sending packet.");
00691                 return LLP_ERROR;
00692         }
00693 
00694         return LLP_OK;
00695 }
00696 /******************************************************************************/
00697 int send_keep_alive(int session) {
00698         u_char packet[sizeof(u_char)];
00699         
00700         liblog_debug(LAYER_LINK, "sending packet LLP_KEEP_ALIVE.");
00701 
00702         /* Constructing packet. */
00703         UTIL_WRITE_START(packet);
00704         UTIL_WRITE_BYTE(LLP_KEEP_ALIVE);
00705 
00706         /* Sending packet. */
00707         if (send_data(session, packet, UTIL_WRITE_END) == LLP_ERROR) {
00708                 liblog_error(LAYER_LINK, "error sending packet.");
00709                 return LLP_ERROR;
00710         }
00711 
00712         return LLP_OK;  
00713 }
00714 /******************************************************************************/
00715 int handle_encrypted_content(u_char *encrypted, int length,
00716                 u_char *mac, int session) {
00717         int offset;
00718         int return_value;
00719         u_char *plain_content;
00720         u_char *real_mac;
00721         llp_data_p packet;
00722         
00723         plain_content = (u_char*)malloc(length);
00724         real_mac = (u_char *)malloc(llp_sessions[session].mac->length);
00725         if (plain_content == NULL || real_mac == NULL) {
00726                 liblog_fatal(LAYER_LINK, "error in malloc: %s.", strerror(errno));
00727                 return_value = LLP_ERROR;
00728                 goto return_label;
00729         }
00730 
00731         /* Decrypting content. */
00732         llp_sessions[session].cipher->function(plain_content, encrypted, 
00733                         llp_sessions[session].cipher_in_key,
00734                         llp_sessions[session].cipher_in_iv, length, UTIL_WAY_DECRYPTION);
00735                         
00736         /* Read the data after decryption. */
00737         offset = length - sizeof(u_short);
00738         util_read_uint16(&packet.padding_length, &offset, plain_content);
00739 
00740         llp_sessions[session].mac->function(real_mac, plain_content,
00741                         llp_sessions[session].mac_in_key, length);
00742 
00743         if (memcmp(mac, real_mac, llp_sessions[session].mac->length) != 0) {
00744                 /* MAC mismatch, drop packet. */
00745                 liblog_error(LAYER_LINK, "MAC mismatch. packet dropped.");
00746                 return_value = LLP_ERROR;
00747                 goto return_label;
00748         }
00749         
00750         liblog_debug(LAYER_LINK, "MAC is correct.");
00751         
00752         return_value = handle_content(&plain_content[packet.padding_length],
00753                         length - packet.padding_length - sizeof(u_short), session);
00754                         
00755 return_label:
00756         
00757         free(plain_content);
00758         free(real_mac);
00759         
00760         return return_value;
00761 }
00762 /******************************************************************************/
00763 int handle_content(u_char *content,     int length, int session) {
00764         llp_data_p packet;
00765 
00766         /* Reading data content. */
00767         UTIL_READ_START(content, length, LLP_OK, LLP_ERROR)
00768         UTIL_READ_BYTE(packet.content_type)
00769 
00770         /* handle data type */
00771         switch (packet.content_type) {
00772                 case LLP_DATAGRAM:
00773                         liblog_debug(LAYER_LINK, "LLP_DATAGRAM received.");
00774                         return handle_datagram(&content[1], length-1, session);
00775                 case LLP_CLOSE_REQUEST:
00776                         liblog_debug(LAYER_LINK, "LLP_CLOSE_REQUEST received.");
00777                         return handle_close_request(content, length, session);
00778                 case LLP_CLOSE_OK:
00779                         liblog_debug(LAYER_LINK, "LLP_CLOSE_OK received.");
00780                         return handle_close_ok(content, length, session);
00781                 case LLP_NODE_HUNT:
00782                         liblog_debug(LAYER_LINK, "LLP_NODE_HUNT received.");
00783                         return handle_node_hunt(content, length, session);
00784                 case LLP_HUNT_RESULT:
00785                         liblog_debug(LAYER_LINK, "LLP_HUNT_RESULT received.");
00786                         return handle_hunt_result(content, length, session);
00787                 case LLP_KEEP_ALIVE:
00788                         liblog_debug(LAYER_LINK, "LLP_KEEP_ALIVE received.");
00789                         return handle_keep_alive(content, length, session);
00790                 default:
00791                         liblog_error(LAYER_LINK, "unknown type, packet dropped.");
00792                         return LLP_ERROR;
00793         }
00794         
00795         UTIL_READ_END
00796 }
00797 /******************************************************************************/
00798 int handle_datagram(u_char *content, int length, int session) {
00799         return llp_enqueue_datagram(session, content, length);
00800 }
00801 /******************************************************************************/
00802 int handle_closing(u_char *content, int length, int session) {
00803         llp_data_p packet;
00804         int hash_length;
00805         
00806         packet.llp_close_request.verifier = (u_char *)
00807                         malloc(llp_sessions[session].hash->length);
00808         if (packet.llp_close_request.verifier == NULL) {
00809                 liblog_fatal(LAYER_LINK, "error in malloc: %s.", strerror(errno));      
00810                 return LLP_ERROR;
00811         }
00812         
00813         hash_length = llp_sessions[session].hash->length;
00814 
00815         /* Reading packet. */
00816         UTIL_READ_START(content, length, LLP_OK, LLP_ERROR);
00817         UTIL_READ_BYTE(packet.content_type)
00818         UTIL_READ_BYTES(packet.llp_close_request.verifier, hash_length)
00819 
00820         if (memcmp(packet.llp_close_request.verifier, llp_sessions[session].verifier,
00821                         hash_length) != 0) {
00822                 /* Dropping packet. */
00823                 free(packet.llp_close_request.verifier);
00824                 liblog_error(LAYER_LINK, "verifier mismatch, packet dropped.");
00825                 return LLP_ERROR;
00826         }
00827         
00828         free(packet.llp_close_request.verifier);
00829         
00830         UTIL_READ_END
00831 }
00832 /******************************************************************************/        
00833 int handle_close_request(u_char *content, int length, int session) {
00834         
00835         if (handle_closing(content, length, session) == LLP_ERROR) {
00836                 return LLP_ERROR;
00837         }
00838         
00839         /* If the session is already on TIME_WAIT state, the timeout is already
00840          * counting. */
00841         if (llp_sessions[session].state != LLP_STATE_TIME_WAIT) {
00842                 llp_sessions[session].state = LLP_STATE_TIME_WAIT;
00843                 llp_sessions[session].timeout = LLP_T_TIMEOUT;
00844                 llp_set_node_inactive(session);
00845         }
00846 
00847         return send_close_ok(session);
00848 }
00849 /******************************************************************************/
00850 int handle_close_ok(u_char *content, int length, int session) {
00851 
00852         if (handle_closing(content, length, session) == LLP_ERROR) {
00853                 return LLP_ERROR;
00854         }
00855         
00856         llp_close_session(session);
00857         
00858         return LLP_OK;
00859 }
00860 /******************************************************************************/
00861 int handle_node_hunt(u_char *content, int length, int session) {
00862         struct sockaddr_in *addresses;
00863         int return_value;
00864         int capacity;
00865         u_char n;
00866         
00867         capacity = LIBFREEDOM_FTU / LLP_ADDRESS_INET_LENGTH;
00868         
00869         if (util_rand_bytes(&n, sizeof(u_char)) == LLP_ERROR ) {
00870                 liblog_error(LAYER_LINK, "error generating node hunt result count.");
00871                 return LLP_ERROR;
00872         }
00873 
00874         /* Computing number of nodes. */
00875         n = (int)((float)n)*((float)((float)capacity/MAX_CHAR));
00876         n = (n == 0 ? 1 : n);
00877 
00878         addresses = (struct sockaddr_in *)malloc(n * sizeof(struct sockaddr_in));
00879         if (addresses == NULL) {
00880                 liblog_fatal(LAYER_LINK, "error in malloc: %s.", strerror(errno));      
00881                 return LLP_ERROR;
00882         }
00883         
00884         /* Collecting nodes to be sent. */
00885         n = llp_get_nodes_from_cache(n, addresses);
00886 
00887         return_value = LLP_OK;
00888         
00889         if (send_hunt_result(session, addresses, n) == LLP_ERROR) {
00890                 return_value = LLP_ERROR;
00891         } else {
00892                 liblog_debug(LAYER_LINK, "packet LLP_HUNT_RESULT sent.");
00893         }
00894         
00895         free(addresses);
00896         return return_value;
00897 }
00898 /******************************************************************************/
00899 int handle_hunt_result(u_char *content, int length, int session) {
00900         int i;
00901         struct sockaddr_in address;
00902         llp_data_p packet;
00903         
00904         if (llp_hunt_valid(session) == LLP_OK) {
00905                 liblog_error(LAYER_LINK, "packet LLP_HUNT_RESULT timed out.");
00906                 return LLP_ERROR;
00907         }
00908         
00909         /* Reading packet. */
00910         if (parse_hunt_result(&packet, content, length) == LLP_ERROR) {
00911                 liblog_debug(LAYER_LINK, "packet format corrupted.");   
00912                 return LLP_ERROR;
00913         } 
00914         
00915         for (i = 0; i < packet.llp_hunt_result.size; i++) {
00916                 address.sin_family = AF_INET;
00917                 memcpy(&address.sin_addr, &packet.llp_hunt_result.list[i].address,
00918                                 sizeof(struct in_addr));
00919                 address.sin_port = htons(packet.llp_hunt_result.list[i].port);
00920                 llp_add_node_to_cache(&address);
00921         }
00922         
00923         free(packet.llp_hunt_result.list);
00924         
00925         return LLP_OK;
00926 }
00927 /******************************************************************************/
00928 int handle_keep_alive(u_char *content, int length, int session) {
00929         llp_sessions[session].timeout = LLP_T_TIMEOUT;
00930         return LLP_OK;
00931 }
00932 /******************************************************************************/
00933 int parse_hunt_result(llp_data_p *packet, u_char *data, int length) {
00934         int i;
00935         int n;
00936 
00937         UTIL_READ_START(data, length, LLP_OK, LLP_ERROR)
00938         UTIL_READ_BYTE(packet->content_type)
00939         UTIL_READ_BYTE(packet->llp_hunt_result.size);
00940         
00941         n = packet->llp_hunt_result.size;
00942         
00943         packet->llp_hunt_result.list = (llp_address_t *)
00944                         malloc(n * sizeof(llp_address_t));
00945         if (packet->llp_hunt_result.list == NULL) {
00946                 liblog_fatal(LAYER_LINK, "error in malloc: %s.", strerror(errno));
00947                 return LLP_ERROR;
00948         }
00949         for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00950                 UTIL_READ_BYTE(packet->llp_hunt_result.list[i].address_type)
00951                 UTIL_READ_BYTES((u_char *)&packet->llp_hunt_result.list[i].address,
00952                                 sizeof(u_int))
00953                 UTIL_READ_UINT16(packet->llp_hunt_result.list[i].port);
00954         }
00955         UTIL_READ_END
00956 }
00957 /******************************************************************************/
